import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.style.use('ggplot')
plt.figure(figsize = (12, 5), dpi = 96)
plt.title("Total Year-on-year Sales", fontsize = 12)
for col in total_yoy_sales.columns[1:]:

plt.legend()
plt.show()
